data.text: @ChrisMusson @mrsanderzisin What samples? If people aren’t volunteering that they are positive, how does sampling work? In my household 3 of 4 are positive right now. We know because we test every time we see new people. Otherwise we wouldn’t know. We haven’t reported it. Just ALL isolating per old advice.
